description:
XenSMTestCase:test_create_volume causes a memory leak when running unit tests on OS X.

When running the unit tests on OS X my machine becomes unresponsive  when it gets to XenSMTestCase:test_create_volume, and the unit tests start consuming over 4GB of memory.
title: XenSMTestCase:test_create_volume causes a memory leak when running unit tests on OS X

comments.content:

When running the unit tests on OS X my machine becomes unresponsive  when it gets to XenSMTestCase:test_create_volume, and the unit tests start consuming over 4GB of memory.
